trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um delegado de processador de eventos para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>eventos, pode efetuar qualquer pré-processamentos adicionais necessários ou cancelar a consulta de base de dados completamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Porque a classe de SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs deriva do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>classe, pode cancelar um pendente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>consulta de base de dados através da definição de <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode examinar e manipular a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>coleção e outras propriedades de consulta de base de dados antes de executar a consulta acedendo a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto exposto pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Também pode examinar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objeto que é transferido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>método acedendo a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs é utilizada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>método para fornecer acesso a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>consulta de base de dados antes de ser executada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo expõe muitos eventos que pode processar para trabalhar com objetos de dados subjacente no decorrer de uma operação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os eventos e associados <xref:System.EventArgs>classes e os delegados do processador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes dos dados são obtidos. | SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de uma insert, update ou de operação de eliminação é efetuada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Ocorrer após a obtenção de dados, insert, update ou operação de eliminação de conclusão. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> classe, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto e quaisquer <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> transmitido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: O `inputParameters` parâmetro é uma <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>coleção de pares nome/valor que correspondem da assinatura do método e são transmitidos por referência.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto que representa o cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>consulta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> transmitido um objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> transmitido um objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Pode examinar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objecto para determinar se a ordenação, paginação, ou um número de linhas são solicitados como parte da operação de obtenção de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Utilizam controlos vinculados a dados a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>classe para pedir que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>executar operações relacionadas com a dados adicionais sobre um conjunto de resultados, tais como os dados a ordenação ou devolver um subconjunto específico de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Estas operações relacionadas com a dados são enumeradas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>enumeração.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objeto, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objeto é especificado durante <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> criação.
